LanguageData.CookCatFood.label: 制造猫粮
LanguageData.CookCatFood.description: Creates Cat Food from raw meat and plant ingredients. Your cats are guaranteed to love it! Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeSilage.label: 制造青贮饲料
LanguageData.MakeSilage.description: 制造 Silage from Hay and plant ingredients for animal food. It is more nutritional than hay. Produces 30.
